column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The pixie flowerkeep is seething with fury.
Grrr, I am flapping mad right now! Some wicked mortals snuck into Il Mheg and tried to steal our flowers!
I used illusions to send them on their way, but instead of learning their lesson, they went and poked my friends with cold, pointy metal!
It's unforgivable! Those brazen wretches must be punished, and you'll come and punish them with me!
Good! Now, to make it interesting, let us make this a race: the first to dole out punishment wins. The villains fled to the southwest─let's go and get them!
Who are you!? The bloody pixies' minion!?
The flowers are gonna make me rich! Piss off or else!
What, you're done punishing them already!? Wow, you're swifter than a salamander!
At any rate, justice has been served, and I doubt those mortals will try anything again. Come, let us return to Lydha Lran.
Thanks to you, we may enjoy our beautiful flowers in peace again.
But I must say, I'm a little disappointed that I lost our little race.
I was planning to turn those thieves into leafmen, and then they could have amused me forever and ever. If you should see them again, tell them to come back!
